result.markdown:
--- title: "Antibodies tracker" listing: contents: posts sort: "date desc" type: default categories: true page-layout: full title-block-banner: true code-fold: true code-tools: true --- ::: {.cell} ::: | **Objective**: monitoring changes in neutralising antibody levels, rate of waning, days to seronegative status ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sero_raw <- readxl::read_excel("~/Downloads/Santanu_COVID_events_research.xlsx", sheet = "long") %>% clean_names() %>% mutate(date = ymd(date)) sero <- sero_raw %>% rename(start = date, content = event) %>% mutate(sero = parse_number(outcome)) %>% mutate(content = str_remove(content, "SARS-CoV-2 ANTI-SPIKE IgG ANTIBODIES")) %>% mutate(content = str_remove(content, "\\:")) %>% mutate(content = str_remove(content, "\\*")) ``` ::: {.cell-output-stderr} ``` Warning: 5 parsing failures. row col expected actual 1 -- a number Fever 2 -- a number Nasopharyngeal/ Oropharyngeal swab 3 -- a number Positive: RNA specific to SARS-CoV-2 detected 4 -- a number Nasopharyngeal/ Oropharyngeal swab 5 -- a number Negative ``` ::: ::: ## Timeline ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sero %>% timevis() ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
``` ::: ::: ## IgG Antibody levels over time ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} sero %>% filter(!is.na(sero)) %>% ggplot(aes(start, sero)) + geom_line() + geom_point(aes(size = sero)) + scale_x_date(labels = scales::date_format("%Y %b")) + labs(title = "Trend in IgG antibody levels", x = "", y = "IgG Antibodies (in AU/ml)", size = "") + theme(legend.position = "top") ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
